metadata.title: CVE-2014-0021 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Chrony before 1.29.1 has traffic amplification in cmdmon protocol Miroslav Lichvar discovered that Chrony is affected by traffic amplification attacks. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain sensitive information.

notes.note: seth-arnold> A fix will likely require protocol changes

criterions.comment: chrony package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2-4ubuntu1').
